message.subject: Children Books
message.content:
M1.1. were these the bedtime stories your parents read to you?
[Request-Information: were presumably previously mentioned bedtime stories ones Matthew's parents read to him]
Flink1.1
M1.2. a couple sounded
kind of familiar to me, but i've forgotten a lot of that stuff.
[Inform: some sounded familiar to Christa, though she has forgotten many of these stories]
M1.3. later,
M1.4. christa
[Conventional: signature]
